google_play_reviews.content: I loved this app since I discovered it on Reddit. Already having beaten the game with no skips, it's fun to try to hit the high rankings on some levels (I got #1 on level 123). I hope there will be a level editor someday.

I'm 5-starring this game on principal. The fact that it's open source and the developer is genuinely committed to implementing improvements based on feedback is wonderful. However, I'm not super impressed with the level design ("this level is just like the previous level, but with smaller platforms!") and I have to wonder... How the heck are people completing some of these in so few moves? Like level 29 in 3 moves. I can't help but feel like I'm missing out on some sort of exploit. Thank you!
a really good game for the brain. there is little to none ads. i hope that you can make more apps like this.
cool

google_play_reviews.content: Nice simplistic game. Developer is quick to respond and fix issues. Overall a fun and pleasant game and experience.

google_play_reviews.content: A fun little game to screw around with while I drop a duece and the wifi doesn't work. Very simplistic. Doesn't have a counter, so you aren't judged on how long it takes. Simply get to the goal by any means necessary. I did like how there wasn't a counter. Leader boards were added recently. Kind of makes this a bit competitive which I find makes me spend longer on the levels trying to be in the top %. Not sure if I like it.
It's a cool game. Nice interface and user friendly Congrats to the developers for pulling this off.
thoroughly enjoyable little game, have recommended this to a couple of mates. hasn't been overcomplicated but a great challenge.
cool
Fun game! Would like more levels and upgrades to explosive shots. ...maybe a time-trial mode?
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you very much for your review concerning our game. I am actually planning to add community levels (and a level maker), so new levels will be coming. I don't think I'll add upgrades to the rockets, as this would make the game less consistent. I am thinking about a time-trial mode, though, but I fear that it may stress players too much :)

Excellent game, finished it and now am trying to perfect my scores. google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hi! google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hi! The reason there still is a small 5 minute delay is because you may start abusing skipping levels and not get the most out of the game, which, I'd say, is a valid concern.

google_play_reviews.content: Fun little game! Request: Make the reset button bigger so it's easier to hit quickly. Half the time I end up firing into the air instead of resetting. Fun game, but the color palette makes the game feel so dull. I wish the levels were the higher contrast colors by default instead of only for a few seconds when you beat the level
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you very much for your review concerning my game. I am always collecting user feedback and emails that I can apply with updates.

google_play_reviews.content: It's a fun and simplistic game. level design is nice and it's appealing to the eye. One thing I think would make the game more fun would be a challenge mode where you have limited bounces.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hi! Check out the latest version, as I added something along the lines of what you suggested - leaderboards (so you can choose if you want to get a better rank or not, but are not limited to a certain kind of gameplay). Let me know what you think about it! :D

google_play_reviews.content: Simple but addicting! Good waste of time when I have an extra 10 minutes or so to kill
some levels make me want to pull out my hair. still fun simple game. highly recommend
Great fun, simple to understand controls!
Fantastic level over level desin so far. introduces new concepts gracefully and builds on them nicely.
Good concept. Challenging
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your review. What can I do to get five stars? :)

google_play_reviews.content: heard about this game on reddit. thought I'd try and support the OP. they made a great puzzle game that's easy to play when you have a few minutes to kill. well done.
Frustrating in a good way!

looking through r/gaming and saw your post, (20.3k upvotes, well done!) and I decided to check it out. Great, so simple, so easy to grasp, and yet so fun. The minimalistic design is so good and there is no star or point system that is putting players under pressure to score well. Beautifully exacuted.

Quick and fun! Its super easy to get into, the controls work as you'd expect, and its tons of fun! There are lots of levels, some are nice and easy, and some are super challenging! You can put it down and come back whenever, and its just all around a good game.

I love this game so much. It's positively addicting, and it's one of those games that is so satisfying but so annoying at the same time. It's perfectly simple, and provides just the right amount of challenge. It's almost completely ad-free, and it's a really good game for whenever I'm bored. Thank you to the developer for making this game, it's awesome and I think everyone should be playing it. (Plus, the concept and gameplay are beautiful and easy to understand.)
Fun game all around. Not very many ads and the mechanics are crisp!
Amazing
Incredible app. Delightful way to spend a few extra minutes, or kill some time. One request, however: could the buttons be moved back down? They're hard to reach on newer (bigger) smartphones.

Has some potential but the physics is really wrong. Why does your block only move after the projectile hits a wall? For action/reaction the block should move when the projectile is shot. There is no physics reason that would cause the block to move when the projectile hits a surface. EDIT: Reread the app description and now I see that the block shoots rockets and it is the rocket explosion that propels the block. Some kind of intro explanation would help clarify this confusion.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback! I added a short intro explanation, like you mentioned. If you encounter any other issues, feel free to contact me at dev.luca1152@gmail.com :)

google_play_reviews.content: I'm pooping and this contributed to that numb leg failing asleep sensation due to my elbows being stuck on my knees.
Awesome. I have only been playing for a few minute and I'm hooked. I would love more. It would be cool if I could change shapes and be a triangle, sphere, etc instead of just a square.
Easy controls, simple gameplay, highly addictive! Great game.
really simple yet intuatuve and fun to play
Reddit sent me and I was pleased to see it was on the Google store as a phone game! It's so simplistic, yet immensely engaging. Hella enjoyable and great way to exhaust some boredom!
game is great it is a good way to pass the time. simple but super fun
Very fun and an excellent challenge
Minimalist style and design, with controls that are easy to learn but have a lot of depth.
This game causes great pain and you must be some kind of masochist to enjoy it. The developer probably takes great pleasure in our suffering.
Would be a five star if they added customization. Other than that fun and addicting game
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback! :) Could you elaborate what you mean by customization - what should be customizable?

google_play_reviews.content: Exceptional game. No fluff. Found you on reedit btw ;)
Thumb workout
great game to pass time by. i saw it on Reddit and decided to give it a try. good job OP
This game is tons of fun and very addicting! The developer's ability to come up with new interesting mechanics made kept the game feeling fresh. I would highly recommend it!
Its a good, simple, game.

google_play_reviews.content: best game of 2019
Simple but fun.
Saw on reddit and downloaded. Great game! Simple but lots of fun. :)
A truly incredible, skill-based game! Luck is nessecary
awesome platforming/puzzle game. Kept throwing new mechanis in and always kept my attention. Had to skip 2 levels üòÖ
super addicting. would be really cool with some other modes like timed or limited taps
innovative, fun, minimalistic.

Surprisingly fun. Jumping is actually quite tough since you need to be quite close to platforms to be ontange of the explosion. I think this would be even better if there qere more mechanics for puzzles other than jumping. The graphics are minimalistic but ghey do the job. If you can, try to implement some squash and stretch in the direction the box is moving.
love this game, so addicting and satisfying to complete each level.
I like it . I got to it through reddit and I am highly impressed.

Came from reddit like a couple people here! Downloaded this game before I left for my vacation(Sunday) and played it on and off and beat it just today(Thursday)! The game has 267 levels that get increasingly challenging and - for me - 5¬Ωhrs of gameplay. Great job on this game! I hope to try and speed run it soon and see what I can do
Game with simple but engaging concept and mechanics. Feels polished and like the dev really cared about making a good game. Strongly recommend
Fantastic game. There's a problem with level #143, it's almost impossible to get to the finish, please fix it!
Found it off Reddit. Just completed it! Super fun and very challenging. Ended up having to skip about 10% of the levels due to fat fingers and a spastic touch screen.
great game, well designed!! (thanks for you post on r/playmygame)

Got to level 28... was fun for a while but now it is feeling a little flat. I agree with the other reviews that it would be helped by adding some other mechanics that get introduced every few levels. Like maybe you need to reach multiple goals in a specific order, or herd another particle to the goals... maybe there are springbards that are extra springy or something. would just like a bit more thought in the design of each level.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank your for your review! The game has more than 250 levels, so, as you may have seen if you continued playing the game, mechanics are introduced along the way. I'll add new mechanics in the future, though, but this is more of a longer term plan :)

google_play_reviews.content: After 7 hours in-game, I am finally free. A lovely experience with moments of marked frustration and clever puzzles. Would play again.

Well designed game. Minimalist and thoughtful mechanics. Love it. Awesome game so far. Level design teaches tricks, features, strategies, and thoughtfully produces an invisible / engaging tutorial via fun physics rules and well placed obstacles.

Came from reddit post. A little over a week later, finished game in 5h 58m 43s! What am I gonna do with my time now? Man, you make some evil levels. Now make more! Really fun game, keep up the great work!
great time killer. good for a few minutes or many
found it through r/gaming. thank you for distracting me for the foreseeable future...
Pretty fun but maybe adding a scoreboard and move counter
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hi! Please check out the latest version, 1.4, as I added exactly what you suggested - leaderboards. Let me know what you think about it! :D

google_play_reviews.content: This game is exactly the way its presented. a good time passer and entertaining too.
love this game! such a smooth and easy way to spend a few minutes here an there
Found in reddit, thought I might give it a try. It's a great game! Really fun and perfect for killing time.
One of the few mobile games that is actually challenging!
Very addictive, some challenging levels that are satisfying to overcome!
This game is challenging and very fun. the level skip option is a rage saver for sure! I love the simplistic, no nonsense design. Great game!!!
Fun
Excellent game, very addicting. Would be cool if we could see what levels we skipped.

Awesome concept and delivers on its name. Great design fellow Redditor!
fun and tricky

really enjoyed the simple physics and aesthetics
it is one of the only games I know that has no ads. The only time you see an ad, is when you want to skip a level, it is simple but very fun.

great game. so glad the developers aren't trying to coerce you to give them money. props on them for the decent business model.

google_play_reviews.content: best mobile game I've played in forever. no annoying ads unless you want to skip levels. the dev is literally a saint.
Came from Reddit, love the physics and minimal look in the game, got the girlfriend to download it and she loves it too :)
amazing and simplistic design that also provides a great amount of fun to pass the time

Challenging platforming game with a simple but clean aesthetic. The game feels like it lacks the precision to consistently perform at the level the game demands. Gets frustrating at times. Minimal obtrusive ads too which is a huge plus.
this game should go viral. keep making levels.
Pretty fun, intuitive and really nice to waste time while waiting for the bus or an order.
saw this on Reddit, really great game
great game, level 51 is the worst :)
found this on reddit, its an amazing game, althoigh now im on level 167 and its starting to get really hard to get past each level. amazing game though!

minimalistic, fun, nice little time killer

came here from reddit and really enjoy the game
Excellent game, simple but well made and rather addicting. Great job man üëç
fun but frustrating. definitely in a good way though!

Saw your post on Reddit and figured I'd give it a try while flying for work. It's a fantastic "simple" game that is great to pickup and put down in short spurts or even to focus on for a while. Excellent!
came from reddit and gave it a shot it's a blast got my son to try it he is having fun
very inventive game
most difficult phone game Ive ever played by far. I got almost 7 hours out of it. What more needs to be said.
It's fun, and sometimes difficult. Worth playing.
Very addicting and challenging. I feel like the time between when you go off the map and cannot possibly save it and you failing could be shortened
Super fun to play! Great way to pass the time. Challenging, but not impossible. Would love to see more levels!
game mechanics are basic but entertaining as the levels progress. still working through what is available. would recommend.
it good
saw this on reddit and love the simplicity

Saw it on reddit. I've been enjoying it. It's easy to grasp, difficult to master. The game feels buttery smooth and polished. I think there is a lot of possibilities for development in terms of mechanics.
Great game. It's really fun and it gets challenging

Found this game through a Reddit post by the developer. Fun and addictive, good mix of easy and challenging levels, and really like the minimalist design. Looking forward to improvements and new features.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Glad you like it! :) I added leaderboards in the latest version, 1.4, so you check that out and let me know what you think about it.

google_play_reviews.content: Addictive
Great game! It's really fun to play and there are no scores or anything just focus and enjoying it and nothing else. Just hoped they would support screens with aspect ratios other than (16:9).

I've played through level 173 after finding your game on Reddit. First, I love the concept. Its interesting and dynamic. I like how you can solve the earlier levels by mashing the fire button, but later levels require more skill. It is annoying that the screen only scrolls with the box sometimes, leading to inaccurate consecitive shots. The bullets don't fall as fast as the cube, which doesn't make sense. Level 172 is extremely frustrating and levels should never NEVER start in mid air

Came from reddit. Loved it. Unfortunately changing my review down to 3 stars because the restart button was moved to the top corner for some strange reason. It's extremely annoying especially since later levels will be restarted a bunch of times. im currently at level 247 but it has become annoying to play rather than fun.

I honestly really like this game, I got my friends to start playing it aswell. One thing that might make the game more realistic is to add sounds or music, just adding sounds to the taps and landings would make the game more exciting. I still really like this game though
saw it on Reddit, fun game.
Simple yet beautiful.
wonderfully consistent physics engine. You never feel like you're losing because of the game, which is nice and refreshing, because often that's a problem with physics games.
loads quick, every level is different and challenging.
Way more levels than I expected and a solid difficulty curve.
Absolutely amazing, would recommend
I originally found this on reddit. It's a great game.

I came from Reddit. I love this game and its great for passing the time. I like that it does not have ads and hopefully it stays that way. I also really like the minimalist style to the game. I'm looking forward to any updates in the future.
Super fun.
